Class ec.cosm.costume.Name 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.cosm.costume.Name
public class Name
extends Object
Name is a utility class that holds static methods that operate on objects that implement interface Named.

Name()

elementNamed(Vector, String)
Returns first element of vector with name matching name.
indexOfElementNamed(Vector, String)
Returns index of first element of vector with name matching name.
indexOfFirstOrLastElementNamed(Vector, String, boolean)
Returns index of first or last element of vector with name matching name.
indexOfLastElementNamed(Vector, String)
Returns index of last element of vector with name matching name.
lastElementNamed(Vector, String)
Returns last element of vector with name matching name.
makeUniqueName(Vector, String, Object)
Returns a copy of modified as necessary to ensure that it is not equal to the name of any object in vector, ignoring skipMe.
namesMatch(Named, Named)
Returns whether or not the two Named objects have the same name.
removeElementsNamed(Vector, String)
Removes all elements of vector whose names match name.

Name 
  public Name()

elementNamed 
  public static Named elementNamed(Vector vector,
                                   String name)
Returns first element of vector with name matching name. Assumes vector is non-null and full of objects implementing Named. Returns null if name is null or if no element has a matching name.
lastElementNamed 
  public static Named lastElementNamed(Vector vector,
                                       String name)
Returns last element of vector with name matching name. Assumes vector is non-null and full of objects implementing Named. Returns null if name is null or if no element has a matching name.
indexOfFirstOrLastElementNamed 
  public static int indexOfFirstOrLastElementNamed(Vector vector,
                                                   String name,
                                                   boolean first)
Returns index of first or last element of vector with name matching name. Assumes vector is non-null and full of objects implementing Named. Returns -1 if name is null or if no element has a matching name.
indexOfElementNamed 
  public static int indexOfElementNamed(Vector vector,
                                        String name)
Returns index of first element of vector with name matching name. Assumes vector is non-null and full of objects implementing Named. Returns -1 if name is null or if no element has a matching name.
indexOfLastElementNamed 
  public static int indexOfLastElementNamed(Vector vector,
                                            String name)
Returns index of last element of vector with name matching name. Assumes vector is non-null and full of objects implementing Named. Returns -1 if name is null or if no element has a matching name.
removeElementsNamed 
  public static void removeElementsNamed(Vector vector,
                                         String name)
Removes all elements of vector whose names match name.
makeUniqueName 
  public static String makeUniqueName(Vector vector,
                                      String originalName,
                                      Object skipMe)
Returns a copy of modified as necessary to ensure that it is not equal to the name of any object in vector, ignoring skipMe. Does this by iteratively appending or incrementing a trailing integer on until it's unique. Assumes Vector is full of objects implementing Named, and assumes that no other object in Vector has the same name as .
namesMatch 
  public static boolean namesMatch(Named one,
                                   Named another)
Returns whether or not the two Named objects have the same name.
